DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long-term performance DF4 Connector System . This evaluation base number DF4 lead-related complication occur study compare number lead enrol study . The DF4 system follow 5 year implant . This study require FDA condition approval DF4 Connector Systems . This study conduct within Medtronic 's post-market surveillance platform .
